await token.name()
await token.symbol()
let token = await ethers.getContractAt("CustomToken",diamond.address)
let diamond = await ethers.getContract("MyDiamond", deployer)
let deployer = (await ethers.getSigners())[0]
await token.name()
await token.decimals()
await token.symbol()
await token._symbol()
await token.symbol()
await token.decimals()
await token.symbol()
await token.name()
let token = await ethers.getContractAt("CustomToken",diamond.address)
await diamond.name()
diamond.name()
diamond.address
let diamond = await ethers.getContract("MyDiamond", deployer)
deployer.address
let deployer = (await ethers.getSigners())[0]
let diamond = await ethers.getContract("MyDiamond", deployer)

let diamond = await ethers.getContract("MyDiamond", deployer)
deployer
let deployer = (await ethers.getSigners())[0]
let deployer = (await ethers.getSigners()).[0]
let diamond = await ethers.getContract("MyDiamond", deployer)
